maps.gml.view

Class RectangleOverlay

  • java.lang.Object
    • maps.gml.view.RectangleOverlay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Overlay

    public class RectangleOverlay
extends java.lang.Object
implements Overlay
    A rectangular overlay.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RectangleOverlay

        public RectangleOverlay(java.awt.Color colour,
                boolean useWorldCoords)
        Construct a RectangleOverlay with no coordinates defined..
        Parameters:
        colour - The colour to draw the rectangle.
        useWorldCoords - Whether to convert the coordinates from world to screen. Set to false if you want to directly specify screen coordinates.

      • RectangleOverlay

        public RectangleOverlay(double left,
                double right,
                double top,
                double bottom,
                java.awt.Color colour,
                boolean useWorldCoords)
        Construct a RectangleOverlay.
        Parameters:
        left - The left-hand X coordinate.
        right - The right-hand X coordinate.
        top - The top Y coordinate.
        bottom - The bottom Y coordinate.
        colour - The colour to draw the rectangle.
        useWorldCoords - Whether to convert the coordinates from world to screen. Set to false if you want to directly specify screen coordinates.

      • setUseWorldCoordinates

        public void setUseWorldCoordinates(boolean b)
        Set whether to use world coordinates or not. If true, the coordinates will be converted to screen coordinates; if false the coordinates will be used as given.
        Parameters:
        b - True to use world coordinates, false otherwise.

        Parameters:

        transform - The current screen transform.
